entry.string: You must be a registered user before you can view the #(1).
entry.translation: Yuoo moost be-a a regeestered user beffure-a yuoo cun feeoo zee #(1).

entry.string: Register for free, or log in if you are already registered.
entry.translation: Regeester fur free-a, oor lug in iff yuoo ere-a elreedy regeestered. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: We're sorry. You do not have authorization to access the #(1).
entry.translation: Ve're-a surry. Yuoo du nut hefe-a oothureezeshun tu eccess zee #(1).

entry.string: Please contact the Site Admin for further assistance
entry.translation: Pleese-a cuntect zee Seete-a Edmeen fur foorzeer esseestunce

entry.string: We're sorry. You do not have authorization to view #(1) entries
entry.translation: Ve're-a surry. Yuoo du nut hefe-a oothureezeshun tu feeoo #(1) intreees
